description: Shows information and alerts related to Kubernetes Cluster Storage / Volumes.

panels.title: Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate
User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate

targets.expr: count (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes ) and (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes )) / (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes )) >= ($pvc_percent_used_warning_threshold / 100)) or vector (0)

panels.title: Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold
Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Current

alert.name: Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate Alert

panels.title: Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Alert History
Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Predicted Available Space History
User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Current

alert.name: User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate Alert

panels.title: User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Alert History
User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Predicted Available Space History
Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold Stats - Current
Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold - History

targets.expr: (1-max by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info ) ) unless (max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes )) or ((max by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info ) ) and (max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes )))

panels.description: WARNING: Any PVCs that are not bound to a running pod will not show up in this state.

panels.description: WARNING: Any PVCs that are not bound to a running pod will not show up in this state.

panels.description: WARNING: Any PVCs that are not bound to a running pod will not show up in this state.

title: Kubernetes Cluster Storage Volumes
